title: Sidewall And Frieze, 1950–58
description: a) Green foliage on a vertical stem forms the motif from which is draped a yellow curtain with light green oval dots in a diagonal pattern. On margin:Made in U.S.A., Harriet C. Bryan for Hobe Erwin Editions, Run 4, 504-5; b) Frieze and dado printed in alternating horizontal rows on length. Frieze consists of foliate arches in green and yellow with brown, white and yellow fringed curtain draped below a cluster of flowers. Above, a brown and white fringe draped above yellow and green foliage, resting on tongue and dart border. On margin: "Made in U.S.A., 505-5, Run 4, Hobe Erwin Editions." One margin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall And Frieze, 1950–58.
1950–58. Machine-printed. Gift of Jessup, Inc.. 1958-115-27-a,b.
